titleStmt.title: The valiant and most laudable fight performed in the Straights, by the Centurion of London against fiue Spanish gallies. Who is safely returned this present moneth of May. Anno. D. 1591.

notesStmt.note: A3v reads: Present at this fight, Maister Iohn Hawes Marchant, and sundry others of good account.
Printer's name and publication date from STC.
Identified as STC 12941 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
